sentences.english: Chen Duxiu was still for moderation and concessions to the Wuhan Kuomintang.
sentences.chinese: 陳獨秀卻依然主張對武漢國民黨的妥協退讓。

sentences.english: The first proposing Chen Duxiu goes to Moscow was Far East Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 共產國際代表主張陳獨秀赴莫斯科目的是懲罰他。

sentences.english: This article tries to give a brief discussion on Chen's achievements and mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 本文試對陳獨秀的功過是非略陳管見。

sentences.english: Chen Duxiu Corrected the left-wing three times during the period of the Great revolution which is reasonable.
sentences.chinese: 大革命時期陳獨秀的三次糾“左”皆是無可厚非的。

sentences.english: The first part is about the formation of the background and conditions of Chen Duxiu's idea of newspaper and periodicals.
sentences.chinese: 五四前後陳獨秀報刊編輯思想形成的背景和條件。

sentences.english: The first part is about the formation of Chen Duxiu's democratic thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 本文第一章是陳獨秀的資產階級民主思想。

sentences.english: Chen Duxiu was a pioneer in moral revolution in modern Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 陳獨秀是近代革命的先驅。

sentences.english: A period of time before the Revolution of 1911 witnessed the participation of Chen Duxiu in the rebellious parties.
sentences.chinese: 陳獨秀在辛亥革命前曾有過一段投身“亂黨”的日子。

sentences.english: Chen Du - xiu had been pursuing socialism before he degraded himself into a Trotskyite .
sentences.chinese: 社會主義是陳獨秀蛻變爲託派以前矢志不渝的追求。

sentences.english: In his life, anti_coufucianist thought is one of Cheng Du_xiu's thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 反孔教是陳獨秀一生中始終堅持的思想之一。

sentences.english: In brief, the Chen Duxiu thought is the democracy and the science.
sentences.chinese: 簡言之，陳獨秀思想即民主和科學。
